questions.question: Simplify: 2³ × 2⁴
questions.explanation: When multiplying powers with same base, add the exponents: 2³ × 2⁴ = 2³⁺⁴ = 2⁷

questions.question: Simplify: ∛27
questions.explanation: ∛27 = ∛(3³) = 3 (cube root of a cube number gives the number)

questions.question: If x⁴ = 16, what is the value of x?
questions.explanation: x⁴ = 16 = 2⁴, therefore x = ±2 (since both 2 and -2 when raised to power 4 give 16)
